main_definition: Neighbors are people who live near or next to one another, typically in residential areas.

meanings_and_examples.definition: People living adjacent houses or buildings
meanings_and_examples.example: John and Mary are neighbors; they share a wall between their apartments.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relationships among people who live near each other
meanings_and_examples.example: After moving to the neighborhood, Sarah wanted to get to know her new neighbors better.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Participants in community activities or events together
meanings_and_examples.example: The block party was a great way for all the neighbors to come together and socialize.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Individuals who contribute to each other's lives, often through support and assistance
meanings_and_examples.example: When Jim's car broke down, his neighbor offered him a ride until he could get it fixed.
